description: This schema describes version 20210221 of the metadata standard for the amulet poem format, designed for the Zora protocol.
title: Amulet20210221

description.description: The description of the amulet, which should include at minimum (1) a link to the current formal definition and (2) a link to the carbon offset purchased in the poem's name.
examples: This is an amulet, a short poem with a lucky SHA-256 hash, explained here: https://text.bargains/ This poem's rarity is <rarity>. Here is this poem's carbon offset: <link>

mimeType.description: The mimeType of the amulet. This will always be text/plain.

poem.description: The text of the amulet. You should include this if possible, but it's not formally required. The text at the contentURI in the Zora NFT is considered the canonical version.

rarity.description: The rarity level of the amulet.

version.description: The calendar version of the schema.

examples.name: morning amulet
examples.description: This is an amulet, a short poem with a lucky SHA-256 hash, explained here: https://text.bargains/ This poem's rarity is COMMON. Here is this poem's carbon offset: <link>
